raw_body: MADAWELA – DR. DUDLEY MAHIPALA BERNARD (MAHI) – Beloved husband of Roshni,​ loving father of Raghvan,​ Ramnath and Romola,​ father-in-law of Gaby,​ grandfather of Alec,​ son of the late Bernard and Anula Madawela,​ son-in-law of late T.B. and Srima Madugalle,​ loving brother of late Jayanthi,​ brother-in-law of Minoli and Themiya Udalagama,​ expired. Funeral was held privately as per his wishes on the 20th of October 2023. 32/​10,​ Jayasinghe Road,​ Kirulapone,​ Colombo 05.070279
